means: （使两物）系牢( fasten的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: All deck fittings, windows, hatches and doors had been fastened.
sentence.Network_cn: 甲板上所有的装置、窗户、舱口盖和门都已经关牢了。

sentence.Network_en: She fastened the belt loosely around her waist.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把皮带松松地系在腰上。

sentence.Network_en: He fastened the dog to the post with a thong.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用一根皮带把狗拴到柱子上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the dog was fastened to a post by a chain ., 那条狗被链条拴在柱子上.
the rope fastened to the tree ., 系在树上的绳子.
the bookshelf is fastened to the wall ., 这个书架是固定在墙壁上的.
the prisoner was fastened by a shackle ., 那个犯人被手铐铐着.

list.abs: 汽车英语2 - 乔木的日志 - 网易博客 ... Fast back 直背式（车顶），溜背式（车顶） Fastener 紧固件 Fastening bolt 紧固螺栓.
大学英语六级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... fascinate vt． 令人入神，使着迷 fastener n． 扣件，钮扣，揿钮 faultless a． 无过失的；无缺点的.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... fast a. 快的，迅速的；紧密的 fasten vt. 扎牢；扣住 fat n. 脂肪.
机械英语词汇|各类常用英语词汇 ... fit together 组装在一起 fasten 锁紧(螺丝) fixture 夹具(治具).

entry.def: When you fasten something, you close it by means of buttons or a strap, or some other device. If something fastens with buttons or straps, you can close it in this way.

example.ex: She got quickly into her Mini and fastened the seat-belt...
example.tran: 她迅速钻进她的 Mini 车里并系紧安全带。

example.ex: Her long fair hair was fastened at the nape of her neck by an elastic band.
example.tran: 她用皮筋将金色长发扎在脑后。

entry.def: If you fasten one thing to another, you attach the first thing to the second, for example with a piece of string or tape.

example.ex: There were no instructions on how to fasten the carrying strap to the box...
example.tran: 没有如何将背带系在盒子上的说明。

example.ex: Mamma fastened the picture on the wall.

entry.def: If someone or something fastens your attention on a particular thing or if your attention fastens on it, you start to concentrate on it rather than on anything else.

example.ex: More and more her memory and all her thoughts fastened on one event...
example.tran: 她越来越多地把记忆和心思都集中在一件事上。

example.ex: The discovery has fastened public attention on the possibilities of DNA analysis for resolving mysteries.
example.tran: 这一发现将公众的注意力集中在用 DNA 分析技术来解开谜团的可能性上。

entry.def: If someone or something fastens on a particular thing, they start to concentrate on it.

example.ex: My mind attempted to calm itself by fastening on this trivial detail...
example.tran: 我尝试将注意力集中在这个小细节上以让自己平静下来。

example.ex: It's a gross oversimplification to fasten on to the red deer as a threat to the environment.
example.tran: 仅关注马鹿威胁环境的一面过于片面了。

entry.def: If someone fastens on you, they keep following, talking to, or staying with you, when you want them to go away.

example.ex: He's fastening on that poor girl like a leech.
example.tran: 他像蚂蟥一样缠着那个可怜的姑娘。

sentences.sentence: "had her gaze fastened on the stranger"

means.word_mean: 3. furnished or closed with buttons or something buttonlike
